mpi_check.description: checks for the presence and functionality of MPI

osu_put_latency.description: measures the latency of one-sided put operations

osu_get_latency.description: measures the latency of one-sided get operations

osu_put_bw.description: measures the bandwidth of one-sided put operations

osu_get_bw.description: measures the bandwidth of one-sided get operations

osu_put_bibw.description: measures the bidirectional bandwidth of one-sided put operations

osu_acc_latency.description: measures the latency of accumulate operations with active/passive synchronization

osu_cas_latency.description: measures the latency of compare and swap operations with active/passive synchronization

osu_fop_latency.description: measures the latency of fetch and op operations with active/passive synchronization

osu_get_acc_latency.description: measures the latency of get_accumulate operations with active/passive synchronization
